0: I told my mama I was on the come up
1: She said, "You going to school, I’ll give you a summer"
2: Then she met No I.D. and gave me his number
3: Ten years later she driving a Hummer
4: Niggas hustle every day for a beat from Ye
5: What I do? Turn around gave them beats to Jay
6: And I’m rapping on the beat they was supposed to buy
7: I guess I’m getting high off my own supply
8: Downtown mixing fabrics tryna find the magic
9: Started a little blog just to get some traffic
10: Old folks’ll tell you not to play in traffic
11: A million hits and the web crashes, damn!
12: South Park had them all laughing
13: Now all my niggas designing and we all swaggin’
14: Ignore the critics just to say we did it
15: This ain’t no fashion show mothafucka, we live it
title: Made in America
